{{Open doors}} |attack1=20 ({{Hit type}}: {{Plain flavour}}) |attack2= |attack3= |attack4= |hit_dice=8 |base_hp=5 |extra_hp=7 |fixed_hp=0 |intelligence={{Normal intelligence}} |genus=dwarf |species=deep dwarf }} {{Flavour|A ferocious and blood-thirsty deep dwarf that revels in the frenzy of combat.}} {{list of | deep dwarves}} ==Useful Info== '''Deep dwarf berserkers''' are devout followers of [[Trog]], taking advantage of Trog's granted abilities to render themselves deadly in combat. When generated with decent weapons and armour, they can be very durable, deadly opponents. They are occasionally found in packs of other [[deep dwarf (monster)|deep dwarves]] in [[the Abyss]]. ==Spells== {{Spellcaster |number= |slot1=[[Brothers in Arms]] |slot2=''none'' |slot3=[[Trog's Hand]] |slot4=[[Berserker Rage]] |slot5=''none'' |slot6=''none'' }} {{clear}} ==Tips & Tricks== *Once they go berserk, focus on taking them down quickly. Their damage output can be scary, especially when armed with [[brand]]ed weapons. *If you intend to attack with [[Hexes]], do so ''before'' they use Trog's Hand and gain doubled [[magic resistance]]. *When low on [[HP]], they'll use Brothers in Arms to suddenly add a [[berserk]] ally to the list of monsters you need to worry about. Don't leave them wounded. ==History== Deep dwarf berserkers were removed in [[0.14]]. [[Category:Dwarf]] [[Category:Obsolete monsters]]
